job_title: Instructor for Kids , ages 7-17 (with focus on schools)
job_description: We are an academy that teaches kids (ages 7 - 17) 3 main skills: Coding and computer science fundamentals, Entrepreneurship concepts, and Presentation skills. Our mission is to build a future generation of builders, problem solvers, shapers of the future, through teaching kids concepts and skills that will set them up to build big things! We are currently expanding our scope of work to working with renowned international schools in Alexandria, and are looking for passionate and skilled instructors, who share our vision and embrace modern teaching methods.If you have a passion for passing knowledge, like working with kids, enjoy simplifying concepts and explaining them to others in a fun and comprehensible manner, and think/act (basically live) outside the usual boxes, we want you on our team! What we offer:An opportunity to teach vital skills that inspire future innovators in a fun, supportive environment.The chance to grow with us across the Middle East and beyond.A culture that promotes personal and professional growth.A central location in Alexandria, just a short walk from Downtown.A competitive salary that increases with our growth together.A role in our founding team, shaping the future of education in the MENA region. Join us in making a meaningful impact on young minds!
job_requirements: What we are looking for:You have previous experience with  teaching kids (ages 7 - 17), and are quite comfortable managing a class of kids as young as 7 years old. A focus on student engagement, enjoyment, and understanding rather than just syllabus completion. You have background in Coding/Computer Science  (through formal study, or any external courses taken). Having a good background in Python is a huge plus! You are comfortable with public speaking and presenting to crowds (maybe even enjoy it) both in  Arabic and English You are comfortable with working in a school setting: outside our branch within the school premise, with a larger number of kids, usually within the range of 12-20 kids per class. Our work is mostly with international schools, so very good spoken English is must! You need to be comfortable running classes completely in English. You will even be a greater fit if you:Have some professional experience with coding (even through freelance work or internships)Have a reasonable background in entrepreneurship concepts.Have background in any of the following: Scratch, Pictoblocks, Code.org, Python, JavaScript, MIT App Inventor, IoT, or Microcontrollers.Experience with coding competitions for kids.

job_title: Full Stack Software Engineer - Internet of Things (IoT)
job_description: *Do you thrive in a fast-paced environment where you can leverage your full range of development skills to build the future of connected devices? Are you passionate about creating user-friendly and scalable applications for the Internet of Things (IoT)? If so, then we want to hear from you!*We are seeking a talented and experienced Full Stack Software Engineer to join our growing IoT team. In this role, you will be responsible for the entire development lifecycle of our IoT solutions, from designing user interfaces and building mobile applications to developing robust back-end systems and managing data flow.*Responsibilities:** Design, develop, and maintain highly functional and user-friendly web applications using ReactJS, JavaScript, and C# for interacting with and managing IoT devices.* Develop and manage robust back-end systems using C# and ASP.NET Core to handle data communication and processing from IoT devices.* Design and implement efficient databases (SQL) to store and manage sensor data from connected devices.* Experience with building mobile applications using Flutter and Dart to create user interfaces for controlling and monitoring IoT devices (a plus).* Collaborate with designers, product managers, hardware engineers, and other software engineers to bring IoT projects to fruition.* Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code for both front-end and back-end systems.* Participate in code reviews and unit testing to ensure code quality and functionality.* Troubleshoot and debug complex technical issues related to IoT device integration and data management.* Stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends in the IoT development landscape.
job_requirements: * 3+ years of experience as a Full Stack Software Engineer.* Proven experience with ReactJS, JavaScript, C#, and SQL.* Experience with building web APIs and familiarity with IoT protocols is a plus.* Understanding of cloud platforms and services for IoT deployments (e.g., AWS IoT Core, Microsoft Azure IoT Hub) is a plus.* Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.* Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.* Strong communication and collaboration skills.* A passion for building innovative and impactful solutions for the Internet of Things.*Bonus points if you have experience with:** Dart, Flutter, and Python for mobile application development*We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as the opportunity to work on challenging and rewarding projects at the forefront of the IoT revolution. If you are a talented and motivated Full Stack Software Engineer who is passionate about building the future of connected devices, we encourage you to apply!*

Maintain effective communication with the project software engineers on project limitation, capability, performance requirement and hardware interface changes.
Monitor application performance after implementation to prevent re-occurrence of program operating problems and ensure efficiency of operation.

job_description:
Description:

This position is responsible for participating in the development, maintenance and enhancement of ERP application written in .net.
Under the guidance of a Software Project Lead, works with company customers, staff, IT colleagues, and other stakeholders to assess, recommend and implement technical solutions.
Applies broad knowledge to various technical functions to accurately anticipate systems impacts.
Understands new information technologies and seeks ways to collaborate with other IT groups to facilitate interfacing and transitions. Shares responsibilities with other team members to ensure on-time delivery, which requires a clear understanding of expectations and capabilities and the ability to act effectively as a team member.

Responsibilities:

Define technical requirements for the future release(s) of vendor packages
Design and develop test cases focused on technical scenarios to ensure product readiness of the systems
Design monitoring and alert mechanisms for infrastructure and applications
Applies broad knowledge to various technical functions to identify system’s impacts. Assists in the identification of technical dependencies.
Plans and executes performance test to ensure scalability and quality of the systems
Defines, implements and executes production support strategies
Installs monitoring and performance tools to support systems
Coordinates technical tasks related to systems in a multi-tier, multi-system project
Participates in production support of the systems and applies strong technical competency to drive resolution for system’s issues and perform root cause analysis
Monitors health and performance of application, including databases
Follows company source control, build and deployment standards and tools.
job_requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or related discipline, or equivalent work experience and technical training, is required.
Over 2 years of wide range of experience in IT in business application design, software development, system integration, testing and build and deployment.
Experience in the industry or in a production/service environment similar to that of the employer is preferred.
Ability to coordinate tasks among several technical cross-functional teams and drive consensus and identify the right stake holder when troubleshooting problems
Strong analytical and conceptual skills; ability to understand dependencies and impacts among systems and environments
Solid teamwork and interpersonal skills; ability to work well on cross-functional project teams and foster team commitments to tasks.
Strong verbal and written communications skills, with the ability to express complex technical concepts in business terms.
Experience with design, development, testing and implementation of software systems is preferred

Technical Requirements:

Strong knowledge of Microsoft Windows technology: WCF, C#, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, Windows Server 2008, IIS 7, Remote Desktop and Domain/Active Directory
Strong knowledge of NHibernate and Spring.net
Strong knowledge of ASP.net forms.
Strong knowledge in third-party components preferred Telerik.
Good experience using SQL, XML, .NET, scripting, javascript
Familiarity with Enterprise monitoring, application monitoring tools desirable

job_description: Job Description:As an IT Help Desk Engineer, your role is to provide technical support and assistance to end-users within the organization. You will be responsible for troubleshooting and resolving hardware, software, and network-related issues, as well as implementing and maintaining IT systems and infrastructure.Responsibilities:1. Technical Support: Respond to incoming support requests through various channels (phone, email, chat, ticketing system) and provide timely and effective technical assistance to end-users.2. Troubleshooting: Diagnose and resolve hardware, software, and network issues by analyzing symptoms, researching solutions, and implementing appropriate troubleshooting steps.3. Issue Escalation: Escalate complex or unresolved issues to the appropriate IT teams or vendors, ensuring proper documentation and communication throughout the escalation process.4. System Administration: Assist in the administration and maintenance of IT systems, including user account management, software installations and updates, and system configurations.5. Incident Management: Follow established incident management processes to ensure timely resolution of IT issues, maintain incident records, and provide status updates to users.6. Asset Management: Maintain accurate inventory records of IT assets, including computers, peripherals, and software licenses.7. User Training: Conduct training sessions or create user guides to educate employees on IT systems, applications, and best practices.8. Security: Assist in implementing and enforcing IT security policies, including user access controls, data backups, antivirus updates, and system patches.9. Documentation: Create and maintain technical documentation, knowledge base articles, and troubleshooting guides to facilitate efficient support and knowledge sharing.10. Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvement and contribute to the development and implementation of IT support best practices.

Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA)  & MCSA is a must as course or certification is high preferred , Fire wall , forty gate ,basic knowledge about data base SQL server - Oracle  3. Troubleshooting Skills: Ability to analyze and diagnose technical issues, apply logical troubleshooting steps, and find effective solutions.4. Customer Service: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively interact with end-users and provide a positive support experience.5. Time Management: Strong organizational skills to prioritize and manage multiple support requests, ensuring timely resolution and meeting service level agreements.6. Teamwork: Ability to work collaboratively with other IT teams, vendors, and stakeholders to resolve issues and contribute to the overall success of the IT department.7. Adaptability: Willingness to learn new technologies, keep up with industry trends, and adapt to changing IT environments.8. Problem-solving: Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking abilities to identify root causes and implement preventive measures.

job_description: About the Role:We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Oracle HCM Techno-Functional Consultant to join our team. In this role, you will utilize your expertise in both Oracle HCM E-Business Suite (EBS) and Oracle HCM Cloud (Fusion) to deliver comprehensive and effective solutions for our clients. Your deep understanding of both platforms will be essential in designing, implementing, and supporting Oracle HCM applications, ensuring successful deployment and ongoing utilization.Key Responsibilities:Requirements Gathering: Collaborate with clients to understand their HR processes and system requirements for Oracle HCM EBS and Fusion.Solution Design: Create functional designs and solution blueprints that meet client needs while adhering to Oracle HCM best practices.Configuration: Configure Oracle HCM modules, including Core HR, Payroll, Talent Management, Benefits, and Time and Labor, for both Oracle EBS and Fusion.Testing and Validation: Lead testing efforts, including unit testing, system integration testing, and user acceptance testing, for EBS and Fusion implementations.User Training: Develop training materials and conduct sessions to ensure effective use of Oracle HCM applications.Support: Provide post-implementation support, troubleshoot issues, and perform system enhancements for both Oracle HCM EBS and Fusion.Technical Design: Draft technical design documents, including customizations, integrations, and data migrations, for Oracle HCM EBS and Fusion.Development: Develop and deploy custom reports, User-Hooks, personalizations, and custom forms.Data Management: Manage data migration processes using tools like SQL, PL/SQL for EBS, and Fusion Data Loader for Cloud.Performance Optimization: Monitor and optimize system performance to ensure high availability and efficiency of Oracle HCM EBS and Fusion applications.
job_requirements: Qualifications and Experience:Experience: Minimum of 5 years in Oracle HCM consulting, with strong experience in both Oracle HCM EBS and Oracle HCM Cloud (Fusion).Technical Skills: Proficiency in SQL, PL/SQL, and Oracle reporting tools. Experience with Oracle HCM Cloud tools like OTBI and HCM Data Loader.Education: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, Business Administration, or a related field. Advanced degrees or certifications are a plus.Certifications: Oracle HCM Cloud certifications or relevant industry certifications for both EBS and Fusion are preferred.Additional Skills: Strong problem-solving abilities, excellent communication skills, and experience with Agile or other project management methodologies.
